title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: In the SWT example ControlExample, under the Text tab, there is an issue where the ControlExampleText beeps when selecting SWT.MULTI option. The beeping sound seems unexpected and incorrect.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExample Text tab, I don't hear any sound.
EB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExample Text tab, I hear a Windows 'ding' sound, which typically indicates an error or mistake.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample. 
2. Go to the Text tab. 
3. Click on Styles SWT.SINGLE. 
4. Click on Styles SWT.MULTI. 
5. Observe the beeping sound.
